author: Dan Neil
title: 2018 Kia Stinger GT2: The Best German Car to Come Out of South Korea
text:
THE 2018 KIA STINGER was in development almost seven years. In that time thousands of product designers, engineers and suppliers must have sat in mock-ups, prototypes and pre-builds of the rakish fastback sedan, the South Korean companyâ€™s new halo car and performance flagship. But nobody saw it. 
At some point Kia board members must have trooped down to the design center in Namyang for a formal signoff. Still not a word.

Now...
